title: I want to crack the NEET 2021 with 700+. I'm starting from zero level. What are the books I should refer to for each subject apart from NCERT as only 7 months are left? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)

response.answer_text: The only way to get that score is read ALLEN OR SRI CHAITANYA MATERIAL along with ncert .that's enough (as Nalin last year topper only followed Allen and ncert ) I am mentioning chaitanya material also because it is almost same as Allen material,trust me you can get there but remember you should sleep less work more since you said that you are starting form zero level(if) Thank you
